mapper.select: SELECT distinct p.id, p.permission_label, p.pid, p.parent_label, p.permission_code, p.route_path, p.route_name, p.route_url, p.permission_type, p.icon FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.id, p.order_num
